It's AI-powered tracking works with any phone or app, making it a game-changer for livestreams, video calls, and third-party camera apps. Plus, it supports multiple device types‚Äîsmartphones, mirrorless cameras, compact cameras, and action cameras‚Äîso you won‚Äôt need separate gimbals for different gear.

On top of that, the SCORP M2 unlocks more creative possibilities with motion-lapse, hyper-lapse, 9-square panorama, and Space Mode (360-degree rotation). Its ergonomic T-shaped handle ensures comfort during long shoots, while fast charging (just 1.9 hours for a full charge) gives you over 10 hours of use. The built-in OLED touchscreen and magic wheel also make adjustments seamless and precise.
If you‚Äôre after a gimbal that‚Äôs powerful, intuitive, and designed for both smartphones and cameras, the SCORP M2 is an excellent pick!
